title: pAdAmbujam tarum
sahitya:
pAdAmbujam tarum maduvaip-parugiDap-parandu vandEn bhAvananE vaNDenavE


anupallavi

  sAdAmalar pala jagattilirundAlum bOdham taruvadun ponnaDiyE anrO


caraNam    kadiroLi kaNDu viriyum kamalam kAdal kiraNattil enil malarAdO
 gati nIyE kaNNA ennAshai mannA ena kanivuDan nin nAma hrInkAram sheidaDimai nAn
